name: Autolayout Responsive tables for data
description:
This file is a preview.

The original design system can be found on my Gumroad page.

---------------------------------------------------------

I created this Responsive table system so you can use it in your work and spend less time designing it from scratch!


AND to make your life easier I designed these tables ready to use!


You can simply copy and paste my tables on your file or you can create your own !
